title: Page 3
content:
There's a 

 beautiful 

 Story, so I've been 

 told, 

 Very sweet, and tender, 

 And true, and old, 

 About a star, 

 And the wonderful birth, 

 Long ago, of a Christ-Child 

 On the earth; 

 And now, every year 

 At a certain time 

 The bells everywhere 

 Ring out their chime, 

 And children gather 

 From near and from far, 

 To sing of that wonderful 

 Child, and the Star.

book.title: A Christmas Snowflake: A Rhyme for Children
book.description: 简介： 是一本关于圣诞节的英语儿童读物，是一本只有32页的短篇小说...
